I found this old thread and have tried the following, where restream
is my InputStream object, my JUnit test class is TestMyClass, loadFile
is my XML file, and the class being tested is MyClass

1.resStream =
Thread.currentThread().getContextClassLoader().getResourceAsStream(loadFile);

2.resStream = TestMyClass.class.getResourceAsStream(loadFile);
      
3.resStream = this.class.getResourceAsStream(loadFile);
 
4.resStream = MyClass.class.getResourceAsStream(loadFile); 

None of the above works for me; all result in resStream = null.

I have also verified that the XML file is being copied by Ant to my
classes.ant directory.

Help would be appreciated, as none of the solutions posted so far in
this thread have worked.

Thanks,
Paolo
